articles.description: Mumbai grabbed the lead through Bartholomew Ogbeche (21') but his goal was canceled out by Esmael Goncalves (76') as Chennaiyin rallied to earn a hard-fought point.
articles.content:
A terrible late error in the box by Ahmed Jahouh rewarded Chennai's perseverance as they held Mumbai City FC to a 1-1 draw in the Indian Super League at the GMC Stadium, Bambolim on Monday.
However,… [+2151 chars]
